componentInstanceProperties.value: Welcome to the Future of Digital Capital Raising

componentInstanceProperties.name: summaryText
componentInstanceProperties.value: VentureCrowd connects visionary investors with cutting-edge startups and helps founders secure vital funding. Whether it's backing the future or building it, we're the launchpad.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Executive Summary

VentureCrowd is at the forefront of WealthTech, creating a digital gateway to private market investments amid a shifting global landscape. Our platform strategically connects issuers with a new generation of investors, addressing the growing demand for high-quality alternative investments as public markets contract.

In FY24, VentureCrowd recorded $6.02M in revenue with a 51% gross margin, underscoring our market alignment and growth potential. With a target of 4,000 issuers per year by 2026 and projected revenues of $50M, we are positioned for significant, scalable growth in a rapidly expanding market. This opportunity offers investors a chance to be part of our product-led growth as we enhance AI capabilities, expand user adoption, and position VentureCrowd as a market leader.

This is a unique opportunity to join our growth journey as we expand AI capabilities, drive user adoption, and establish VentureCrowd as a market leader.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: THE PROBLEM

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Capturing the Shift: Unlocking Growth in Private Markets

The global investment landscape is rapidly shifting from public to private markets. Private assets, driven by demand for alternative investments and diversification, are projected to reach $21 trillion AUM by 2030. VentureCrowd’s platform aligns with this shift, catering to the growing mass affluent and emerging affluent demographics, who are increasingly seeking access to private markets.

Investment markets are undergoing a massive global shift, from public to private.
Key trends, such as wealth transfer to Millennials and Gen Z, the digitisation of capital markets, the integration of AI and the rise of purpose-driven investing, position VentureCrowd to capture this growth. VentureCrowd's platform simplifies the investor-issuer connection, enabling access to private market assets traditionally restricted to institutional players, and meets the demand for ESG-focused investments. This strategic position allows VentureCrowd to serve an under-tapped market, creating opportunities for mass adoption and scalable growth.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
The redirection of capital is being driven by material macroeconomic
trends that are providing strong tailwinds for VentureCrowd's strategy

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Private Markets: Bridging the Gap Between Investors and Issuers in a Maturing Landscape


The private capital market is highly fragmented, lacks transparency and continues to operate manually with most incumbents disinclined to adopt digital transformation because they don't yet believe they need to. As a result of those inefficiencies, issuers have limited access to the true universe of investors and millions of investors around the world are shut out of the private markets. It is not the lack of capital that is the issue, but the lack of efficient connection between investors and issuers that is the real challenge. This mismatch between capital supply and demand has artificially reduced the size of the private capital markets, making capital raising unnecessarily harder than it would be if market forces were operating efficiently. VentureCrowd's counter-positioning is one of it's key strengths.


Addressable Market

The global alternative assets market is forecast to grow to $24.5 trillion by 2028 at a GACR of 8%, with the private debt component growing at a CAGR of 11% and venture capital at 14%. In Australia, private capital assets under management (AUM) reached a record $118 billion in September 2022, up 21% in 9 months.

The growth is being driven, in part, by growing participation from mainstream investors attracted to the proven benefits of diversification, hedging characteristics, and exposure to higher returns. Ernst & Young forecasts adoption by mass affluent investors will increase to 32% in 2024, more than double the 2021 figure. Similarly, 53% of financial advisors plan to raise their alternative investments allocations to more than 15% in the next two years, and more than 20% of advisors expect that their alternative investments allocations will be in excess of 25% of their portfolios.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Revolutionising Private Market Access: Product Strategy & Differentiation


VentureCrowd’s platform is designed to revolutionise private market access by simplifying the investment journey for both investors and issuers. Our unique, multi-asset class platform combines cutting-edge AI with a seamless digital experience, offering an integrated solution that enables private companies, property developers, and syndicate leads to connect directly with high-quality investors.

VentureCrowd’s competitive edge lies in our multi-asset capabilities, robust data integration, and scalable infrastructure, making us the platform of choice for sophisticated investors and entrepreneurs. By embedding advanced AI and data science, we are set to redefine investment accessibility, helping issuers raise capital more effectively and supporting investors with a secure, transparent, and engaging platform.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Meet Sophie


Central to our product strategy is "Sophie", our proprietary AI-driven capital-raising coach, which guides issuers through the capital-raising process with industry best practices, reducing time, complexity, and costs. This innovation allows us to serve a broader range of clients at scale, providing significant operational efficiencies and unmatched user experience.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Invest Today

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Scaling Beyond Niche: Our Path to Market Leadership

The race to establish the leading platform that connects investors and issuers in private markets is accelerating, with many platforms coming and going. In Australia, the space is primarily filled by small retail crowdfunding platforms or niche-focused investment banks, often specialising in either credit or property, which limits scalability and fails to address the broader needs of emerging affluent investors.

VentureCrowd’s strategy takes a deliberately broad approach, targeting the mass affluent and high-net-worth segments with a multi-asset platform that scales beyond local limitations. Our model is designed for global scalability, meeting the market’s evolving needs and positioning VentureCrowd for enduring market leadership.

We have strategically developed competitive advantages that are difficult to replicate

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: We have proven our model with sustained performance over many years, and are now set for scalable growth

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
We have upgraded our team, ready for growth


Our upgraded team uniquely combines strong legal, regulatory & financial services experience together with venture capital, property, funds management and digital product development expertise, bringing together all the complex skills required to deliver this next-generation WealthTech platform.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Capital Raise

VentureCrowd is currently raising capital through the issue of Convertible Notes to fund the next phase of our platform development and working capital. On completion of the next phase of our platform development we believe the business will have a materially higher valuation.

By the end of FY25, driven by the introduction of our AI-enabled digital capital raising product, we are forecasting gross revenue of $14.5M, generating gross profit of $9M at a gross margin of 62%. At a revenue multiple of between 8 and 15 times revenue, that would value VentureCrowd at between $116M and $217M.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Join the Future of Digital Capital Raising


Invest in VentureCrowd

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Invest

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
The Offer

VentureCrowd Holdings Pty Ltd is offering a convertible note with a 7.5% p.a. coupon rate, capitalised until conversion, over an 18-month term.

The note will automatically convert into ordinary equity at a 20% discount, based on the valuation set by a lead investor in the next qualifying capital raise or liquidity event. If no such event occurs within 18 months, conversion will take place at a pre-set valuation of $66 million, reflecting 8.5X FY22 gross revenue.

Funds raised will be directed towards platform development, expanding engineering capabilities, scaling user growth, and providing essential working capital, positioning VentureCrowd for sustained growth and market leadership.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Exit Strategy

In Q3 2025, we intend to position the business for a more substantial growth capital round to fund international expansion. At that time, intend there to be an opportunity for investors in this round to sell their shares (should they wish to) and take advantage of the 25% uplift. By the end of 2025 we expect the business will be well placed for a merger or a trade sale, providing a liquidity opportunity for investors in this round.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: What Our Investors Are Saying

componentInstanceProperties.name: DescriptionText1
componentInstanceProperties.value:
"As the listed market has become more and more efficient I have increasingly looked to ETFs as the core of my investment strategy but I now supplement those core investments with private companies that are striving to make a difference.  Purpose led companies. I invest in VentureCrowd because they look to the future.

They understand that change is inevitable as more and more investors look to make their own decisions. Decisions that don't just consider the bottom line but give equal importance to the impact the company and its offerings will have on society and the environment - sometimes for generations to come. I believe the total addressable market for VentureCrowd is enormous and the foundations are in place to make an impact globally."

componentInstanceProperties.name: DescriptionText2
componentInstanceProperties.value:
"One of the most attractive aspects of VentureCrowd is its ethical approach to investing with clear criteria for the prospects they promote.

They look for investments that are environmentally sound, technologically innovative and likely to deliver great results for the community."

componentInstanceProperties.name: DescriptionText3
componentInstanceProperties.value:
"I invested in VentureCrowd because the market for alternative assets, including venture capital, property and private equity and credit, will continue to grow at a rapid pace and significant demand will be driven by a new cohort of digitally savvy mass affluent investors.

I have two decades of venture capital and private equity experience at an executive and board level, and believe that VentureCrowd’s existing investment technology and approach to generative AI, experienced management team, proven traction and vision, position it well for scalable growth."

componentInstanceProperties.name: DescriptionText4
componentInstanceProperties.value: "Being part of the Nexba story from its early stages has been a pleasure. Their revolutionary approach and big ambition to not only rid the world of artificials and sugar but to recreate the entire food industry from the ground up, is not only inspiring but achievable. They have had incredible growth, have a stellar team and a solid plan for The Goodness Group Global to lead the better-for-you market in the years to come."

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Why Invest Through VentureCrowd?

VentureCrowd is the leading digital investment platform for alternative assets. We find and fund the brightest and most innovative startups.

Our curation and due diligence is rigorous and our track record of success speaks for itself:

  • Only digital investment platform in Australia to have successfully delivered multiple exit returns to investors through equity crowdfunding.
  • 76K+ members and counting.
  • Over $330,000,000 in capital raised since inception.

VentureCrowd is investor-led, which means we only list deals with secured professional external lead investors. Our investors then invest on the same economic terms as professional investors. If you invest in one of our deals you will receive equity or ownership in the company that is raising the capital. Not only will your investment come with lower fees and capital commitments, but it will also come with reduced deal complexity, and you’ll have access to alternative equity, property and credit opportunities on the same terms as professional lead investors.

Invest now

If you would prefer to speak to one of our team members about this offer, please:

  • email us at hello@venturecrowd.com.au or
  • call us on 1300 039 655

Please note, the Fund Manager reserves the right to vary or cancel the Offer at any time, vary the amount raised under the Offer, vary or waive the Minimum Investment and close the Offer, without notice and without giving reasons.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Risks

Whilst the directors of VentureCrowd are experienced business managers with deep experience in the key areas that are core to the operation of this business, there are always risks associated with investing in venture capital opportunities which may, either directly or indirectly, result in reduced distributions and/or a loss of some of the capital value of an investment in the Fund. Before deciding whether to subscribe for Units, you should consider whether an investment in this Fund is suitable for you and obtain professional advice.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Fees

Investors invest through a VentureCrowd Trust, which VentureCrowd manages as a single asset. We charge an annual management fee to investors, payable on exit and we only charge a performance fee where an exit delivers profit, thereby aligning ourselves with investor outcomes.

  • Contribution Fee: 1.1% This is the fee charged by the Trustee for establishing the Trust and the purchasing entity, structuring the overall investment and raising capital by issuing Units. Payable upon acceptance of your investment by the Trustee.
  • Management Fee: 1.65% per annum (charged on conversion or exit).
  • Performance Fee: 20% of the profit. We only charge a performance fee on conversion or exit.
  • Off Market Transfer Fee (if you wish to transfer your holding to someone else): $500 + 2% of the total amount transferred, unless the buyer is identified by you in advance.

*If the buyer is identified by you in advance the 2% fee does not apply. VentureCrowd cannot guarantee a purchaser for your holding.
